item.title: Borderlands 2
item.dc:creator: CasserolesCascade
item.description:
At first I was not so interested in it, because the first one was pretty flawed (but still fun), but after the first hour or so you can already see all the improvements and effort put into this. Funny dialogues, dynamic battles with good ragdoll physics and overall cool physical effects (of course only on PC), very innovative environments/areas, awesome cartoonish graphics, better guns, great soundtracks, a huge variety of enemies, better quests, better npcs etc. etc. If this doesnt get atleast NOMINATED for GOTY, id be pissed.

item.title: Borderlands 2
item.dc:creator: TheOneAndOnly
item.description:
The game does feel a bit lonely at first (there is only one inhabitant in the first town you see) but later you get to Sanctuary, and they really added a lot more interaction with NPCs. They make little comments every time you talk to them, and you get some fun quests (like Claptrap’s party, but I will not spoil that one). So, get it nao! It’s really good, and the icey environments are incredibly well done - the ice looks so real, it’s even a bit scary :fffuuu:

The music is fantastic too, awesome to listen to, even while not playing. Thistrack is my favorite (ambient music while exploring the ice), even though it was unfortunately not included in the official soundtrack Just my luck…

item.title: Borderlands 2
item.dc:creator: Aiden_Pearce
item.description:
Dotard:

So the game is actually good? Hmm… haz level 67 Soldier in the first one, didn’t bother finishing the DLC on 2nd playthrough, as getting to max level consist just from:

  • port to Eridian Promontory, kill everything
  • do it for as long as till you are lvl 69
    To get decent loot:
  • port again to Eridian Promontory once ur max lvl and open the hidden red chest till a decent Legendary drops
  • do it again

Please tell me, the sequel isn’t like this.

It isn’t:
1)There is a lot more interaction between you and the NPCs
2)Missions are more varied and interesting(most of them anyway)
3)Legendary loot can be obtained through various ways :s cavenging,missions,buying,golden keys,playing slot machines…
4)The game is EVEN funnier this time around
5)It actually HAS a story(unlike the first one)
